K12D0689_H0659:476a-1: a'arya aa mo gha d'a sha kalpha r'a dza bi dhi n'a ma /
K12D0689_H0659:476a-3: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
K12D0689_H0659:476a-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0689_H0659:476a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0689_H0659:476a-6: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan
K12D0689_H0659:476a-8: bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0689_H0659:476a-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis shing
K12D0689_H0659:476a-10: bsngags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal
K12D0689_H0659:476a-11: po'i cho ga zhib mo zhes bgyi ba 'di nyid
K12D0689_H0659:476a-12: skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:476a-13: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K12D0689_H0659:476a-14: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
K12D0689_H0659:476a-15: rjes su brtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du brjod par bgyi yis gson cig /
K12D0689_H0659:476a-16: aom padma hasta mah'a aa mo gha p'a sha sa
K12D0689_H0659:476a-17: h'a yam sa ma ya hri da y'am tsa ra
K12D0689_H0659:476a-18: tsa ra h'um/ don yod pa'i rang bzhin gyi spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po zhes bgyi ste /
K12D0689_H0659:476a-19: las thams cad kyang bgyi ba'o //
K12D0689_H0659:476a-20: aom di bya sam p'u ra nam ge phi ki kasha ni h'um/
K12D0689_H0659:476a-22: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na sgra grags pas
K12D0689_H0659:476b-0: sems can rnams ngan 'gro las thar bar @476b 'gyur
K12D0689_H0659:476b-1: ro // aom pattra p'u ra ya aa mo gha ba to sa manta pra bhe sv'a h'a /
K12D0689_H0659:476b-2: lhung bzed kyi rig pa ste /
K12D0689_H0659:476b-3: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na bdud rtsi'i rnam
K12D0689_H0659:476b-4: par 'gyur zhing gang gis zos pa rnams ngan 'gro
K12D0689_H0659:476b-6: phyag rgya thal mo lhan cig tu dam du sbyar
K12D0689_H0659:476b-7: ba las slar padma'i tshul du bgyis nas mdzub mo
K12D0689_H0659:476b-8: nor bu lta bur bgyis te /
K12D0689_H0659:476b-9: gung mo yid tsam bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi
K12D0689_H0659:476b-10: nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i phyag
K12D0689_H0659:476b-11: rgya ste / lag pa spyi bor bkan nas bzhag
K12D0689_H0659:476b-12: pa spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i rig pa 'di lan
K12D0689_H0659:476b-13: rgya ste / bdun brjod do // aom tryee bh'a sa nu ga ta /
K12D0689_H0659:476b-14: aa bhi shinytsa tu m'am sa rbatree ya dh'i ke
K12D0689_H0659:476b-15: padma ma ni su padme aa mo ghe sarba ta
K12D0689_H0659:476b-17: rig sngags 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngags
K12D0689_H0659:476b-18: 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang
K12D0689_H0659:476b-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:476b-21: rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po chen por yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:476b-22: rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:476b-23: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:476b-24: 'jig rten gyi gtso bo gcig pu'i gnas su yang 'gyur par the tshom ma mchis so //
K12D0689_H0659:476b-25: aom padmo shn'i sha pi ma le h'um phat/
K12D0689_H0659:476b-26: bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mogang
K12D0689_H0659:476b-27: la las gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu
K12D0689_H0659:476b-28: pa 'di snying rje dang ldan par bgyis te bzlas
K12D0689_H0659:476b-29: brjod bgyis na byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
K12D0689_H0659:476b-30: 'gyur ba nas sa bcu la gnas pa'i bar du
K12D0689_H0659:476b-32: mi'i skye dgu dag gis 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod par 'gyur la /
K12D0689_H0659:477a-1: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /
K12D0689_H0659:477a-2: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i padma'i gtsug tor dri ma
K12D0689_H0659:477a-3: med pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te 'di la
K12D0689_H0659:477a-5: bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge
K12D0689_H0659:477a-6: bcu pa 'di ni yon tan chen po tshad ma
K12D0689_H0659:477a-7: mchis pa rnams dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
K12D0689_H0659:477a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12D0689_H0659:477a-9: rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no //
K12D0689_H0659:477a-11: rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags kyi snying po 'di dag
K12D0689_H0659:477a-12: ni yi ge 'bru re re tsam bzlas brjod byas
K12D0689_H0659:477a-13: pa tsam gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed
K12D0689_H0659:477a-14: par 'gyur na / rigs kyi bu gang gis ched du gnyer te /
K12D0689_H0659:477a-15: ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod dang /
K12D0689_H0659:477a-17: cho gas tshul bzhin du rgyas par sgrub pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12D0689_H0659:477a-18: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i padma'i gtsug tor dri ma
K12D0689_H0659:477a-19: med pa'i snying po khro bo'i gzungs sngags rim par
K12D0689_H0659:477a-20: phye ba gsang sngags chen po yi ge bcu pa
K12D0689_H0659:477a-24: dus tshigs 'ga' rer dran pa tsam gyis kyang sems
K12D0689_H0659:477a-25: can de'i mtshams med pa'i las byas pas mnar med
K12D0689_H0659:477a-26: pa'i dmyal bar gzhol ba tshe bskal bar gnas par
K12D0689_H0659:477a-27: 'gyur ba yang las thams cad rnam par dag par
K12D0689_H0659:477a-28: 'gyur ro // sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyang rang rab tu zad par 'gyur /
K12D0689_H0659:477a-29: lus yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur /
K12D0689_H0659:477b-0: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral @477b par 'gyur /
K12D0689_H0659:477b-1: tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
K12D0689_H0659:477b-2: gyi khams su padma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur
K12D0689_H0659:477b-3: ro // tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur /
K12D0689_H0659:477b-5: bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:477b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur /
K12D0689_H0659:477b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:477b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal ba /
K12D0689_H0659:477b-10: lag na rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rtsa ba don
K12D0689_H0659:477b-11: yod pa'i zhags pa'i padma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po
K12D0689_H0659:477b-12: dri ma med pa gsang ba 'di rig sngags 'chang
K12D0689_H0659:477b-18: dge bsnyen ma gang la las lan cig tsam yang dran pas yid la byed cing /
K12D0689_H0659:477b-19: yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang /
K12D0689_H0659:477b-20: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:477b-21: lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i blo dang /
K12D0689_H0659:477b-22: dmigs pa dang ldan pas sems can gang yang rung
K12D0689_H0659:477b-23: ba'i rna khung du brjod na sems can de dag
K12D0689_H0659:477b-24: ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur te de ni
K12D0689_H0659:477b-25: gnas med do // sems can de dag thams cad
K12D0689_H0659:477b-26: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang ldan par
K12D0689_H0659:477b-27: gnas med do // 'gyur ro // lan gnyis brjod
K12D0689_H0659:477b-28: na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro
K12D0689_H0659:477b-29: gnas med do // 'gyur ro // // lan gsum brjod na rims dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478a-4: mdze nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro /
K12D0689_H0659:478a-9: gshed byed thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:478a-10: lan lnga brjod na 'thab pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478a-13: shags su gyur ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:478a-14: lan drug brjod na 'jigs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478a-17: pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:478a-18: lan bdun brjod na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478a-19: sems can thams cad kyi 'tshe ba dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478a-20: yams thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:478a-21: lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can
K12D0689_H0659:478a-22: thams cad kyi don du nyin re bzhin du tshig
K12D0689_H0659:478a-23: gzhan mi smra bar snying po 'di lan bdun bdun
K12D0689_H0659:478a-24: bzlas par bya'o // lag na rdo rje gang la
K12D0689_H0659:478a-25: la dag 'di ltar sdig pa mi dge ba bcu
K12D0689_H0659:478a-28: dam pa'i chos la skur ba 'debs pa /
K12D0689_H0659:478a-29: 'phags pa'i gang zag la rab tu brnyas pas de
K12D0689_H0659:478a-30: dag sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba'i tshe'i dus byas
K12D0689_H0659:478a-32: dge slong gang la la dag rang gi bslab pa'i sdom pa dral ba /
K12D0689_H0659:478a-33: tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral cing zhig pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478a-35: slob dpon la ma gus shing 'khu ba dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478a-36: dam pa'i chos la rma 'byin pas tsha'i dus byas
K12D0689_H0659:478a-37: par 'gyur na sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur
K12D0689_H0659:478a-38: pa de dag gi don du bye ma gtsang ma
K12D0689_H0659:478b-0: la lan @478b grangs bdun bdun bzlas nas /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-1: dur khrod du bor ba'i ro dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-3: dur mchad du bcug pa'i ro'am /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-4: rus pa la bye ma des gtor bar bya'o //
K12D0689_H0659:478b-5: gang dang gang na sems can rnams kyi rus pa
K12D0689_H0659:478b-6: gang dag yod pa de dang de dag tu bye
K12D0689_H0659:478b-7: ma des gtor ma thag tu /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-8: de dang der bye mas phog pa'i sems can de dag rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-12: gnod sbyin gyi skye gnas su skyes par gyur na
K12D0689_H0659:478b-13: yang de dag de'i mod la tshe brjes nas thams
K12D0689_H0659:478b-14: cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha dang mi'i gnas
K12D0689_H0659:478b-15: su rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-16: phyin chad nam yang sems can thams cad dmyal ba dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-18: dud 'gro'i 'gro ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:478b-19: gzungs sngags yi ge bcu pa 'di nyid gro ga dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-20: ras sam shog bu la bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-21: gnas der srog chags rkang gnyis pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-24: rkang med pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de
K12D0689_H0659:478b-25: dag thams cad mchod rten de'i gri ma phog pa
K12D0689_H0659:478b-26: tsam gyis de dag gi sdig pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:478b-27: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:478b-36: lag 'gro la sogs pa srog chags phra mo gang
K12D0689_H0659:478b-37: dag gis mchod rten de'i grib ma la 'grims pa
K12D0689_H0659:478b-38: thams cad kyang grib ma phog pa tsam gyis de
K12D0689_H0659:478b-39: dag rnams kyi sdig pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:479a-0: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad kyang mtho @479a *//
K12D0689_H0659:479a-1: ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:479a-2: bud dung la sogs pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod
K12D0689_H0659:479a-3: byas nas gnas mthon po'i rtse mo nas dung de
K12D0689_H0659:479a-4: bus na / sems can gang dag gis dung de'i sgra thos pa'i skyes pa'am /
K12D0689_H0659:479a-10: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams
K12D0689_H0659:479a-11: cad bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol
K12D0689_H0659:479a-12: bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad
K12D0689_H0659:479a-13: nas chos thos te rim gyis mya ngan las 'da'
K12D0689_H0659:479a-15: sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang /
K12D0689_H0659:479a-16: gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:479a-17: gang dag skyabs gsum nye bar gzung ba dang /
K12D0689_H0659:479a-18: gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:479a-19: gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas yang dag
K12D0689_H0659:479a-20: par bsdams pa de dag gis sgra de thos na
K12D0689_H0659:479a-21: / de dag thams cad byang chub las phyir mi
K12D0689_H0659:479a-22: ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag
K12D0689_H0659:479a-23: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya
K12D0689_H0659:479a-24: / bar 'gyur ro // tshe de brjes ma thag
K12D0689_H0659:479a-25: tu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye
K12D0689_H0659:479a-27: dkar po la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge
K12D0689_H0659:479a-31: rgyal po'i pho brang du bdug par byas na /
K12D0689_H0659:479a-32: gang dag de'i dri la bsnams pa'i sems can de
K12D0689_H0659:479a-33: dag thams cad kyang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
K12D0689_H0659:479a-34: pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur te /
K12D0689_H0659:479b-0: sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs @479b pa rab tu 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-1: chos gos la rab tu bdugs nas lus la gyon na gang zag de'i sdig pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:479b-2: sgrib pa thams cad ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-3: lus la bab pa tsam gyis bag chags kyi dri ma dang /
K12D0689_H0659:479b-4: ser sna dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-5: gos la bdugs te bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-6: bdag gi gos la rab tu bdugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang /
K12D0689_H0659:479b-7: btsun mor bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-8: kun gyi mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-9: 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-10: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su zhugs na dge
K12D0689_H0659:479b-11: 'dun thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro
K12D0689_H0659:479b-12: // skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhugs na nor dang /
K12D0689_H0659:479b-13: longs spyod chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing mchod gnas chen po'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-14: tsandan gyi bdug pa'i cho ga'o //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-15: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rtog pa las padma'i gtsug
K12D0689_H0659:479b-16: tor dri ma med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi
K12D0689_H0659:479b-17: pa'o //// de nas khro bo'i rgyal ba me'i /
K12D0689_H0659:479b-18: rtog pa rab tu bshad bya ste //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-19: don yod rgyal po rmad byung tshe //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-20: kun tu dngos grub thogs med cing //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-21: dkyil 'khor kun tu dbang bskur bas //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-22: sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-23: bdud dang bgegs dpung rnam par 'jig /
K12D0689_H0659:479b-24: gnod sbyin ssrin sreg po gsang ba ba /
K12D0689_H0659:479b-26: bsam pa thams cad rab rdzogs byed //
K12D0689_H0659:479b-27: aom bhri ku ti damshtre aa mo gha sa ma ye /
K12D0689_H0659:480a-0: @480a *// aa bhi shinytsa m'am sarba bid aa mo gha ga aa bhi she ka h'um/
K12D0689_H0659:480a-1: mi li mi li sv'a h'a /
K12D0689_H0659:480a-2: khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o //
K12D0689_H0659:480a-3: de nas sku gzugs kyi cho ga ni dngul la
K12D0689_H0659:480a-4: khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam
K12D0689_H0659:480a-5: shin tu mdzes shing tshad dang ldan pa /
K12D0689_H0659:480a-8: rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pas spyi bor brgyan pa /
K12D0689_H0659:480a-9: zla ba tshes pa mgo la thogs pa /
K12D0689_H0659:480a-17: g-yon dang po na zhags pa /
K12D0689_H0659:480a-19: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa padma dang zla ba'i gdan la rgyal po'i rol stangs kyis 'dug pa /
K12D0689_H0659:480a-20: gcan gzan khro bo'i pags pas smad dkris pa'o //
K12D0689_H0659:480a-21: g-yas phyogs su ni lha mo sgrol ma autpa la
K12D0689_H0659:480a-22: thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o
K12D0689_H0659:480a-23: // g-yon phyogs su ni lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che thogs pa /
K12D0689_H0659:480a-24: rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o //
K12D0689_H0659:480a-25: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi drung du rig sngags 'chang
K12D0689_H0659:480a-26: pus mo btsugs pa lag na spos por thogs shing
K12D0689_H0659:480a-27: bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das la gyen du
K12D0689_H0659:480a-28: blta ba'o // yang na ni ri mor bri bar bya ste cho ga bzhin no //
K12D0689_H0659:480a-29: gzugs brnyan de dag gi drung du ba'i lci bas byug pa byas la /
K12D0689_H0659:480a-30: tsandan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gung gum gyis mchod yon bya ste /
K12D0689_H0659:480a-31: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
K12D0689_H0659:480b-0: dkyil 'khor de'i steng @480b du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhugs su gsol te /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-1: de'i drung du bzlas brjod stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0689_H0659:480b-2: de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:480b-3: rkang pas phan tshun du 'chag par 'gyur /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-7: lag pa g-yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-8: yid la bsams so cog thams cad dang /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-9: mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:480b-10: bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0689_H0659:480b-11: gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi mdun
K12D0689_H0659:480b-13: dran pa tsam gyi mod la dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:480b-14: las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-15: bklags pas las thams cad dang /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-16: dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-17: grub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:480b-18: khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i zhags pa nas bzung ste /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-19: bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas nas sngon chad bsags pa'i bsod nams dang /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-20: las kyi bgo bskal thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:480b-21: tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po thob pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-22: che ba nyams su myang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:480b-23: gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa ba brgyas
K12D0689_H0659:480b-24: byas nas dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par
K12D0689_H0659:480b-25: 'gyur ro // padma nas bzung ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na nyon mongs pa dang /
K12D0689_H0659:480b-26: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:481a-2: bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:481a-4: stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na; 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:481a-5: 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:481a-6: rked pa nas bzung ste bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad
K12D0689_H0659:481a-7: byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro
K12D0689_H0659:481a-8: // rgyal po dang btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te /
K12D0689_H0659:481a-9: bdag nyid ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nor rnams nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:481a-10: cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
K12D0689_H0659:481a-11: khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbu la bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur te /
K12D0689_H0659:481a-12: 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o //
K12D0689_H0659:481a-14: sgrub pa 'di dag gis ni 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0689_H0659:481a-15: gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis rig
K12D0689_H0659:481a-16: sngags 'chang gi mdun du byon te /
K12D0689_H0659:481a-17: ci dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0689_H0659:481a-18: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga las byung ba rdzogs so ////
K12D0689_H0659:481a-19: pandi ta manydzu shr'i warma dang /
